dimensions: Warp x Weft: 90 x 99 cm (35 7/16 x 39 in.)
title: Huipil (uncut)
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft
description: Three white-on-white patterned textiles sewn together (each having four selvages). The two outer textiles are patterned with stripes of geometric shapes including a bird. The center is patterned with zigzag bands, one above the other, to form an elongated diamond shape. Head opening is uncut.
name: Huipil (uncut)
